dn30:1.6.7: anvabhi → anubhi (s1) | annubhi (s2, s3) | ānubhi (pts1) | aṃnubhi (ṭīkā)
dn30:1.12.4: Tena sucaritena saggamagamā → tena so sucaritena saggamagamāsi (s1-3)
dn30:1.15.10: Yaṃ gihissapi → na taṃ gihissapi (s1-3, pts1)
dn30:1.18.3: Piyavāditañca samānattatañca → piyavadatañca samāna­chanda­tañca (bj, pts1) | piyavadatañca samāna­chandañca (s1-3)
dn30:1.19.1: pubbe manussabhūto samāno → samāno bahuno janassa (bj, pts1)
dn30:1.30.12: Pasayha sahidha sattaratanaṃ → pasayha sa hi ca sattaratanaṃ (bj) | pasayha abhivasana-varataraṃ (pts1)
dn30:1.33.5: Samaṅgikatvā → samaggi katvā ca (s1-3) | samaggiṃ katvā (pts1)
dn30:2.3.6: Mahiñca pana ṭhito → sa hi ca pana ṭhito (bj, pts1) | samā ca panaṭṭhito (s1-3)
dn30:2.6.9: Atthassa middhī ca → idaṃ samiddhañca (bj, mr) | addhaṃ samiddhañca (s1-3)
dn30:2.10.2: na ca visāci → na ca visācitaṃ (bj, pts1) | na ca visāvi (s1-3)
dn30:2.27.2: samphappalāpaṃ na muddhataṃ → na samphappalāpaṃ na vuccaddhatanti (s1-3) | samphappalāpaṃ na abuddhatanti (mr)
dn30:2.31.13: Samamapi sucisusukkaṃ → suci ca suvi­sud­dha­susuk­kaṃ. (s1-3) | suvisuddhaṃ suvisukkaṃ. (pts1)
dn30:2.31.25: Imamapi ca paramapi ca → paraṃpi paramaṃpi ca (s1-3) | imampi ca parampi ca (pts1)
